CustomField.description: Calculates the number of days between the created date and the Welcome Call Complete Date. If Welcome call complete date is blank, null is returned.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISNULL(Welcome_Call_Completed__c) , Null,
Welcome_Call_Completed__c - datevalue(CreatedDate) - 2*( floor((Welcome_Call_Completed__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)))
CustomField.label: Days to Welcome Call Completed
